org.openscience.cdk.qsar.model.R
Class LinearRegressionModelPredict

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.qsar.model.R.LinearRegressionModelPredict
Deprecated. 

public class LinearRegressionModelPredict
extends java.lang.Object

A class that wraps the return value from the R function, predict.lm. This is an internal class used by R to return the result of the call to predict.lm. As a result it should not be instantiated by the user. The actual modeling class, LinearRegressionModel, provides acess to the various fields of this object.

Author:
Rajarshi Guha
Requires:
r-project
Belongs to CDK module:
qsar
Source code:

                                    int degreesOfFreedom,
                                    double residualScale)
Deprecated. 
Construct the object to contain linear regression predictions.

Parameters:
predicted - A 1-dimensional array of predicted values
standardErrors - A 1-dimensional array of standard errors of prediction
lowerBounds - A 1-dimensional array of lower confidence bounds
upperBounds - A 1-dimensional array of upper confidence bounds
degreesOfFreedom - The degrees of freedom of hte predictions
residualScale - The scale of the residuals

LinearRegressionModelPredict

public LinearRegressionModelPredict(double predicted,
                                    double standardErrors,
                                    double lowerBounds,
                                    double upperBounds,
                                    int degreesOfFreedom,
                                    double residualScale)
Deprecated. 
Construct the object to contain linear regression predictions. This is required if a single prediction was requested in which case R will pass a single double value rather than an array.

Parameters:
predicted - The predicted values
standardErrors - The standard errors of prediction
lowerBounds - The lower confidence bounds
upperBounds - The upper confidence bounds
degreesOfFreedom - The degrees of freedom of hte predictions
residualScale - The scale of the residuals
